rows.label: qev010502_MSG0001
rows.name:
Oh, sweet baby back ribs! You're human!
I guess my luck hasn't completely run out on me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010502_MSG0002
rows.name:
Those monsters were chasing me everywhere. First I ran
out of ammo, then I lost my comm device, then...
Well, I was pretty sure my time was up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010502_JNK0010
rows.name: Explain

rows.label: qev010502_SEL0011
rows.name: Explain to Conner that Nathan sent you to find him.

rows.label: qev010502_JNK0020
rows.name: Inform

rows.label: qev010502_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell Conner that Monica was worried about him.

rows.label: qev010502_MSG0003
rows.name:
Well, you're still the one I owe! ...Heh.
Though I can totally picture the two of them going at it.
They're like an old married couple.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010502_MSG0004
rows.name:
Why am I not surprised? I mean, it's sweet of her to
care, but she's always been a bit of a worrywart.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010502_MSG0005
rows.name:
Still, I suppose I should report back and let them know
I'm okay.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010502_MSG0006
rows.name:
I hate to bother you, but could you help me look for
my comm device? It should be nearby.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010502_MSG0007
rows.name:
I know we're both fellow BLADEs and all, but I'm still
willing to pay you for your time. It's my goof-up that
put us here anyway.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010502_MSG0008
rows.name:
My stupid comm device slipped out of my hand while I
was running away from some indigens, so it shouldn't
be more than a couple of segments away from here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010502_MSG0009
rows.name:
I should let poor Monica know I'm okay before she
blows a gasket. So please help me find that device![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010502_MSG0010
rows.name:
Any luck? Once I've got that baby, I can reach the
others no matter where they are.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010502_MSG0011
rows.name: Hey, nice work! I'm impressed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010502_MSG0012
rows.name: Glad to see at least one of us here is a pro.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010502_MSG0013
rows.name:
And now I know who to turn to for help next time
things take a turn for the worse![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010502_MSG0014
rows.name: All right. Let me call up the others here...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010502_MSG0015
rows.name:
Here. This is my way of saying thanks.
I really appreciate the help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010502_MSG0016
rows.name:
I managed to get in touch with my team,
thanks to you. They're on their way here now.[ST:wait ]
